pages.text: Greetings worm! If you're reading this, you must be either one lucky little guttersnipe, or a true seeker of knowledge! I have many names, but you can call me Granny, or Ms. Toefungus if you're feeling polite, ehehehehe! So you want to be a master of the art of brewing, eh? Well don't rely on those Brewing Stands then! A true Witch uses their Cauldrons to make their artistry!
But not just any Cauldron will do! You need a true Witch's Cauldron! Place it on a fireplace, or campfire or those magma blocks or whatever and fill it with water!
The Cauldron also needs the power of the spirit world to properly brew, so it must have some Soul Candlesticks that can absorb the energies of the dead around.
You also need a Cauldron Ladle in order to brew properly! When brewing, you would need to right-click the Cauldron with the ladle to begin the Completion stage!
If you're brew has failed or you're unsatisfied with it, shift-right click the Cauldron with a magic Wand or Staff will clear all of its content!
